sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>leather</radical> radical and the <kanji>leather</kanji> kanji are exactly the same! Cool!
readingMnemonic: One way to get <kanji>leather</kanji> is to skin a male chicken, a <reading>cock</reading> (<ja>かく</ja>). Not a very efficient way to get leather, but one way nonetheless.
readingInfo: You won’t get much leather from a cock, but you could skin one in a pinch, should you really need a little extra leather.
